Name: Corona Blossom Vol.3 Journey to the Stars
About the game: 'Corona Blossom' is a heartwarming trilogy of visual novels featuring the 'e-mote' system and artwork by nanaca mai! Learn the fates of the characters you've grown to know and love in the exciting final chapter of the Corona Blossom saga! STORY: R-ne: a cute, shapeshifting metallic lifeform who one day fell from space. Keiji Osaki: a young man with a mysterious past, now working at a mech garage. After growing close through adventures and mishaps throughout the summer, the two of them made a promise: to return R-ne to her home planet. To that end, Keiji has steadily been working on a plan together with space pirate Lily, and his coworker at the garage, Kumiko. But Ms. Kanade's big reveal has thrown a spanner in the works. The people of Hanma Town must now do battle against a mysterious organization that's after R-ne. Time is running out for Keiji and his friends! Will they ever be able to return R-ne to space? And is that really the right move? The thrilling conclusion to R-ne's journey is finally here!
